game.name: Ashes of Immortality II - Bad Blood
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The final episode in the Ashes of Immortality saga! Find out what happens to Orlok and Simona, heroes of the series, in this enthralling 16-bit style RPG full of colorful characters.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The final episode in the Ashes of Immortality saga! Find out what happens to Orlok and Simona, heroes of the series, in this enthralling 16-bit style RPG full of colorful characters.
